chart_description: This chart shows the rate of system calls related to shared memory usage within the system. It provides insight into the usage patterns and trends of shared memory in a system.

dimension_descriptions.at: The number of attach calls made to shared memory segments per second.
dimension_descriptions.ctl: The number of control operations (e.g. set or get permissions) made on shared memory segments per second.
dimension_descriptions.dt: The number of detach calls made from shared memory segments per second.
dimension_descriptions.get: The number of get calls made to shared memory segments per second.
